alert.note: Alert for North Beltrami; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Red Lake, northwestern Hubbard, southeastern Polk, south central Beltrami, northeastern Mahnomen and Clearwater Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weme, or 34 miles northwest of Bemidji, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fosston, Bagley, Clearbrook, Island Lake in Mahnomen County, Gonvick, Wilton and Shevlin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Minnesota.
